mapper.insert: insert into member_t(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_email, m_phone, status, reg_date) values(#{m_id},#{m_pw},#{m_name},#{m_email},#{m_phone}, '0', sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from member_t where m_id = #{id} and m_pw = #{pw} and status = '0'
SELECT * FROM member_t WHERE m_id = #{m_id} and status = '0'
mapper.update: update member_t set status = 1 where m_id = #{m_id} and m_pw = #{m_pw}
